name: Circa50: Dwell
subtitle: Dog Crate & Pet House
description: Finally, a mid century modern pet crate that not only blends into your modern home, but also accentuates the overall look!  Say goodbye to your old plastic eyesore.  The Circa50: Dwell incorporates the need for a crate with your lifestyle without compromising your standards for furniture quality and beauty.

details.title: Features
content: Right-hand side OR left-hand side pet entrance
Holes on either side allow for ventilation and easy moving
Handcrafted with 3/4" Walnut Hardwood veneer Euro Ply
Optional removable 1" foam cushion in your choice of fabric
Optional removable 2" foam bed with washable fleece cover

details.title: Shipping
content: Items ship free, fully assembled (Continental US only)
For international shipping rates, please contact me for a quote
